alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Hardin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:35PM CDT until May 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARSHALL...SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN AND SOUTHWESTERN GRUNDY COUNTIES... At 935 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Union, or 5 miles south of Eldora, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Union around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Liscomb, Whitten, Conrad and Beaman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
